mapper.select: select cs.courses_id,ps.papers_id,b.batch_name,b.batch_hide,b.batch_id,c.class_id,cs.courses_name,uu.user_id,uu.user_name,ds.departments_name,ur.role_id from user u left join user uu on u.departments_id=uu.departments_id left join userrole ur on uu.user_id=ur.user_id left join role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id left join teach t on t.user_id=uu.user_id left join courses cs on cs.courses_id=t.courses_id left join papers ps on ur.role_id=ps.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=ps.batch_id left join class c on c.class_id=t.class_id left join departments ds on uu.departments_id=ds.departments_id where u.user_Id=#{user_Id} and ps.oapers_visible=1 and u.user_id!=uu.user_id and r.role_name="教师" and b.batch_hide!=0 group by uu.user_id,cs.courses_id

select cs.courses_id,ps.papers_id,b.batch_name,b.batch_hide,b.batch_id,c.class_id,cs.courses_name,uu.user_id,uu.user_name,ds.departments_name from user u left join user uu on u.departments_id=uu.departments_id left join userrole ur on uu.user_id=ur.user_id left join role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id left join teach t on t.user_id=uu.user_id left join courses cs on cs.courses_id=t.courses_id left join papers ps on ur.role_id=ps.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=ps.batch_id left join class c on c.class_id=t.class_id left join departments ds on uu.departments_id=ds.departments_id where u.user_id=#{user_id} and ps.oapers_visible=1 and b.batch_id=#{batch_id} and u.user_id!=uu.user_id and r.role_name="教师" and b.batch_hide!=0 group by uu.user_id,cs.courses_id
select * from fraction where rater=#{rater} and gradeds=#{gradeds} and papers_id=#{papers_id} and courses_id=#{courses_id}
select batch_hide from batch where batch_id=${batch_Id}
